attributes.action: campaign to make sure that the slander of care workers is illegal.
attributes.additional_details: Many care workers are university graduates since the government cuts in social work and psychology some time ago. There are very few graduate jobs in this category. I believe that slandering a persons degree or work experience ought to be a prosecutable offence. Care workers who have had previous careers should have their qualifications and experience recognised by other people. Also care workers going into careers in other areas of work should not have their careers slandered either in any way. We have had enough of it!
